Sentencas: A novel Ni-YSZ cermet anode for solid oxide fuel cell application has been developed in order to solve problems with our previous anode, which was prepared from a powder mixture of NiO and precalcined YSZ.
Titulo: Configurational and electrical behavior of Ni-YSZ cermet with novel microstructure for solid oxide fuel cell anodes

Sentencas: In contrast to homogeneously sized YSZ in our previous anode, the new material has a YSZ frame made of coarse (average size of 27.0 mu m) and fine (average size of 0.6 mu m) powders to sustain the network of Ni and pore.
Titulo: Configurational and electrical behavior of Ni-YSZ cermet with novel microstructure for solid oxide fuel cell anodes

Sentencas: Unlike the previous anode, no significant changes in shrinkage and microstructure of the new anodes were detected during sintering in air and upon transformation of NiO to Ni metal in a reducing atmosphere.
Titulo: Configurational and electrical behavior of Ni-YSZ cermet with novel microstructure for solid oxide fuel cell anodes

Sentencas: The influence of the content of coarse YSZ powder was examined by fixing the Ni volume ratio at 40%.
Titulo: Configurational and electrical behavior of Ni-YSZ cermet with novel microstructure for solid oxide fuel cell anodes

Sentencas: It has been found that with an increasing amount of coarse YSZ powder, the electrical conductivity increased by three orders of magnitude around 20 weight percent (w/o) coarse YSZ powder and also that the anode with an 80 w/o one was found to be the most stable during cell fabrication and cell operation.
Titulo: Configurational and electrical behavior of Ni-YSZ cermet with novel microstructure for solid oxide fuel cell anodes

Sentencas: It is concluded that the consolidated framework made from two distinctly sized particles leads to a more stable YSZ frame and Ni network.
Titulo: Configurational and electrical behavior of Ni-YSZ cermet with novel microstructure for solid oxide fuel cell anodes
